alert.note: Alert for Eastern Alachua; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 13 at 3:00AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Alachua and west central Putnam Counties through 345 AM EDT... At 300 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Orange Heights, or 7 miles southwest of Melrose, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Interlachen, Hawthorne, Melrose Landing, Hollister, Newnans Lake, Rochelle, Johnson, Mannville and Grove Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
